translations: 急走，猛冲；暴跳，挣扎；突然离去；饰以荷叶边
（衣裙的）荷叶边；气冲冲走路的样子

sentences.sentence: She will flounce and argue when asked to leave the room.
sentences.translation: 要是让她离开房间，她会暴跳如雷、吵闹不休的。

sentences.sentence: She left the room with a flounce.
T0130 is a new flounce shirt of THURS!
sentences.translation: T0130是 THURS 的一款新的荷叶边衬衫！
